description.zh-cn: 明朝第六位及第八位皇帝。
description.en: The sixth and eighth emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明英宗之父。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming dynasty, father of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗皇后，明英宗之母。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Xuanzong, mother of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第七位皇帝，明英宗异母弟。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Ming dynasty, half-brother of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，明英宗长子。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming dynasty, eldest son of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝宦官，导致土木堡之变。
description.en: A Ming dynasty eunuch who caused the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 瓦剌太师，在土木堡之变俘获明英宗。
description.en: Oirat Taishi who captured Emperor Yingzong in the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗的护卫将军，于土木堡之变中杀死王振。
description.en: A guard general of Emperor Yingzong who killed Wang Zhen during the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 明朝大臣，领导北京保卫战，后被明英宗冤杀。
description.en: A Ming dynasty minister who led the Defense of Beijing and was later wrongfully executed by Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，夺门之变主谋之一。
description.en: A Ming dynasty general and one of the masterminds of the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明朝大臣，夺门之变主谋之一。
description.en: A Ming dynasty official and one of the masterminds of the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明朝宦官，夺门之变主谋之一。
description.en: A Ming dynasty eunuch and one of the masterminds of the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗的皇后。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗的贵妃，明宪宗生母。
description.en: A noble consort of Emperor Yingzong and the birth mother of Emperor Xianzong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗天顺朝内阁首辅。
description.en: Grand Secretary during the Tianshun era of Emperor Yingzong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗在亲征瓦剌过程中兵败被俘的事件。
description.en: An event where Emperor Yingzong was defeated and captured by the Oirats during a military campaign.

description.zh-cn: 石亨、徐有贞等人发动政变，助明英宗复辟的事件。
description.en: A coup launched by Shi Heng, Xu Youzhen and others that restored Emperor Yingzong to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 于谦等人领导的抵御瓦剌进攻北京的战役。
description.en: A battle led by Yu Qian and others to defend Beijing against the Oirat invasion.

description.zh-cn: 曹吉祥与石亨图谋发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion planned by Cao Jixiang and Shi Heng.

description.zh-cn: 要求宫妃在皇帝死后陪葬的制度。
description.en: The system requiring imperial concubines to be buried alive with the deceased emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期的蒙古部落联盟。
description.en: A confederation of Mongol tribes during the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的京城地区，即今北京市。
description.en: The capital region of the Ming dynasty, modern-day Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗是明英宗的父亲。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong was the father of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 孝恭章皇后是明英宗的母亲。
description.en: Empress Xiaogongzhang was the mother of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 景泰帝是明英宗的异母弟。
description.en: The Jingtai Emperor was the younger half-brother of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗是明宪宗的父亲。
description.en: Emperor Yingzong was the father of Emperor Xianzong.

description.zh-cn: 孝肃皇后是明宪宗的生母。
description.en: Empress Xiaosu was the birth mother of Emperor Xianzong.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄睿皇后是明英宗的皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaozhuangrui was the empress of Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 王振擅权，怂恿明英宗亲征，最终导致土木堡之变。
description.en: Wang Zhen abused his power and encouraged Emperor Yingzong to lead a personal expedition, which ultimately led to the Tumu Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗在土木堡之变中被瓦剌俘虏，中断了其第一次统治。
description.en: Emperor Yingzong was captured by the Oirats during the Tumu Crisis, interrupting his first reign.

description.zh-cn: 也先率领的瓦剌军队在土木堡击败明军并俘虏了明英宗。
description.en: The Oirat army led by Esen Taishi defeated the Ming army at Tumu Fortress and captured Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 在土木堡之变中，樊忠指责王振为国贼并用棰将其击杀。
description.en: During the Tumu Crisis, Fan Zhong denounced Wang Zhen as a traitor and killed him with a mace.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗被迎回后，景泰帝将其软禁于南宫，不欲其复位。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was brought back, the Jingtai Emperor placed him under house arrest in the Southern Palace, not wishing for his restoration.

description.zh-cn: 于谦领导了北京保卫战，成功抵御了瓦剌的进攻。
description.en: Yu Qian led the Defense of Beijing and successfully repelled the Oirat invasion.

description.zh-cn: 夺门之变使被软禁的明英宗成功复辟。
description.en: The Duomen Coup enabled the restoration of the house-arrested Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 夺门之变废黜了景泰帝的皇位。
description.en: The Duomen Coup deposed the Jingtai Emperor from the throne.

description.zh-cn: 石亨是夺门之变的主要策划和领导者之一。
description.en: Shi Heng was one of the main planners and leaders of the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 徐有贞是夺门之变的主要策划和领导者之一。
description.en: Xu Youzhen was one of the main planners and leaders of the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 曹吉祥是夺门之变的主要策划和领导者之一。
description.en: Cao Jixiang was one of the main planners and leaders of the Duomen Coup.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗复辟后，以谋逆罪名将北京保卫战功臣于谦杀害。
description.en: After his restoration, Emperor Yingzong executed Yu Qian, the hero of the Defense of Beijing, on charges of treason.

description.zh-cn: 以“不杀于谦，今日之事无名”为由，说服明英宗处死于谦。
description.en: Persuaded Emperor Yingzong to execute Yu Qian by arguing 'Without killing Yu Qian, this affair (the coup) has no legitimacy'.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗复辟后，依然追念王振，并为其建立旌忠祠。
description.en: After his restoration, Emperor Yingzong continued to commemorate Wang Zhen and established a memorial shrine for him.

description.zh-cn: 曹吉祥和石亨图谋发动叛乱以反对明英宗。
description.en: Cao Jixiang and Shi Heng plotted a rebellion against Emperor Yingzong.

description.zh-cn: 作为天顺朝的贤臣，李贤辅佐明英宗勤于理政，并劝止其更换太子。
description.en: As a virtuous minister of the Tianshun era, Li Xian assisted Emperor Yingzong in governance and advised him against replacing the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的宫妃殉葬制度自明太祖朱元璋开始。
description.en: The practice of imperial concubine immolation in the Ming dynasty began with its founder, the Hongwu Emperor Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗临终前下遗诏，废除了宫妃殉葬制度。
description.en: Before his death, Emperor Yingzong issued an edict to abolish the practice of imperial concubine immolation.
